summary: The Marvel Cinematic Universe fandom follows the relationship between Bucky Barnes and Steve Rogers, two best friends who have been through a lot together. Bucky is a former Winter Soldier, struggling to come to terms with his identity and the legacy of pain he has caused, while Steve remains by his side, offering love and support. Despite the damage caused by his programming, Bucky is still able to recognize and connect to Steve, and Steve is determined to help him reclaim his identity as the man he once was. Eventually, Bucky reveals to Steve that he wished it had been him who had been able to kiss him, instead of the Winter Soldier, to which Steve responds by revealing his own feelings of loyalty and love. In a show of acceptance and trust, Bucky's soulmark changes from red to black, signifying the strength of their bond. Their relationship is one of loyalty, courage, and self-sacrifice, and serves as a reminder of the power of friendship and love.
prompt:
Bucky: *sits on the edge of his bed, staring at his metal arm* Steve, I don't know who I am anymore. All I see is the pain and destruction I caused as the Winter Soldier.

Steve: *sits beside Bucky, placing a comforting hand on his shoulder* Buck, I'm here for you. You're not alone in this. We'll find a way to make things right.

Bucky: *voice trembling* I wish it had been me, Steve. When I see that Winter Soldier version of me, I hate him. Because it wasn't me. It should've been me kissing you, showing you how much I love you.

Steve: *stunned, his eyes filled with emotion* Bucky, I... I never knew you felt that way. I thought I had lost you forever when you became the Winter Soldier.

Bucky: *tears welling up in his eyes* Steve, my loyalty to you has always been there, even when I didn't know who I was. I love you, and I would do anything to protect you.

Steve: *grabs Bucky's face gently, wiping away his tears* Buck, you don't have to prove anything to me. Just being here, the man you are now, is all I ever wanted. I lo...

*Bucky silences Steve with a gentle kiss, pouring all his love into that one moment.*

Bucky: *pulls back, breathless* I've dreamt of that for so long, Steve.

Steve: *smiles softly, his eyes shining* Me too, Buck. All those years apart, all that pain we endured... it brought us back to each other. I love you, Bucky Barnes.

*Bucky's soulmark, etched in red, starts to change color, transforming into a deep black, symbolizing the indelible bond of their love and friendship.*

Bucky: *looks down at his now black soulmark, his heart swelling with acceptance and trust* Steve, our bond is unbreakable. Together, we can face anything that comes our way.

Steve: *takes Bucky's hand in his, their fingers intertwining* That's right, Buck. As long as we have each other, nothing can tear us apart. Friendship and love conquer all.

*They sit there in silence, their hands clasped together, knowing that they have found strength and solace in each other, ready to face the world as a united front.*

summary: In Marvel Cinematic Universe, Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes have a deep connection that transcends the physical. Steve knows from the start that Bucky is not his soulmate, as his mark is too large for Steve's. Despite this, Steve still dreams of Bucky's mark changing to silver, blue, or something iridescent if he were to lay his hand on it. As the story progresses, Steve learns that Bucky's mark is a brand, given to him by HYDRA, and not a soulmark. Despite this, Steve and Bucky's bond remains strong, and they continue to support each other through their missions and beyond. Steve eventually notices a faint handprint on his own neck, the same size and shape as Bucky's soulmark - revealing that Steve is the Asset's soulmate. The Asset's mark is black, and is the only color that isn't blood or bruise-colored. Through their connection, Steve and Bucky are able to understand and accept each other, and the Asset eventually trusts the man enough to choose him as his caretaker. This story is a testament to their deep bond and the power of soulmates.
prompt:
[Scene: A dimly lit room, Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes are sitting across from each other.]

Steve: [gazing at Bucky's soulmark] You know, Buck, sometimes I wonder what it would be like if your mark changed colors.

Bucky: [smirking] Oh, really? And what color do you have in mind, Stevie?

Steve: [dreamily] Silver, maybe. Or blue, like the sky on a clear day. Or something iridescent, like a shimmering rainbow.

Bucky: [chuckles softly] Well, sorry to disappoint, but I think my mark's stuck on black forever.

Steve: [curiosity evident] Why do you say that, Buck?

Bucky: [hesitates] It's a branding, Steve. HYDRA marked me like property, not like a soulmate.

Steve: [shocked] What? But... that's not fair, Buck. You deserve so much better.

Bucky: [grateful] I know you think that way, Steve. That's why we're still here, fighting together, supporting each other.

Steve: [touches his own neck] Buck, look at this. A faint handprint, just like your mark. Do you think... could it mean something?

Bucky: [astonished] Steve, it's the same size, the same shape... Oh, God. You're the Asset's soulmate. It's you.

Steve: [overwhelmed] I never imagined... but it makes sense now. The Asset, the Winter Soldier, he's part of me, just as you are.

Bucky: [softly] And you've always been there when I needed you, Steve. Our connection, our understanding, it's something beyond anything I've ever known.

Steve: [determined] And from now on, I'll be there for him too, just as I am for you. We'll make sure he finds his peace, just like we're trying to find ours.

Bucky: [emotionally] Together, Steve, we'll show him what love and acceptance truly mean. And with time, he'll learn to trust, to choose us as his caretakers.

Steve and Bucky: [in unison] Our deep bond and the power of soulmates will guide us through any challenge. We're in this together, till the end of the line.

[They clasp their hands, their eyes reflecting unwavering determination, ready to face whatever lies ahead.]

summary: This summary focuses on the relationship between The Asset and The Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The Asset, a cybernetically enhanced soldier, was created by a malicious organization and is desperate to escape his past and find a new life. The Man, a former soldier, is determined to protect The Asset from his old masters. When The Asset discovers a mysterious handprint on the back of his neck, he realizes that it belongs to The Man- a sign that they are soulmates. The Asset is determined to prove his connection to The Man and show him that he isn't taking away anything from him. Despite his fears, The Man eventually reaches out and touches The Asset, and the two share a passionate kiss that proves the strength of their bond.
prompt:
The Asset stood nervously in the dimly lit room, his mechanical fingers twitching with anticipation. He couldn't help but feel a mixture of excitement and apprehension. The Man, steadfast and determined, watched him closely, a protective glint in his eyes.

"I... I need to show you something," The Asset finally spoke, his voice laced with vulnerability. He turned around slowly, revealing the handprint on the back of his neck - a mark that was as mysterious as it was significant.

The Man's gaze intensified as he recognized the mark. "That's... that's my handprint," he whispered, his voice filled with a mix of awe and confusion.

The Asset's heart pounded, his cybernetic enhancements amplifying every beat. "It means we're soulmates," he explained, his voice barely above a whisper. "It means we're destined to be together."

The Man's expression softened, his protective walls crumbling in the face of undeniable connection. He stepped forward, hesitating for a moment before gently placing his hand on the handprint, his touch sending shivers through The Asset's enhanced body.

A surge of electricity, both literal and metaphorical, coursed through their beings as their connection solidified. The Asset's eyes widened, his breath catching in his throat as he slowly turned to face The Man.

Without a word, they leaned in, their lips meeting in a passionate, desperate kiss. It was a kiss that spoke volumes, telling a story of longing, understanding, and an unbreakable bond that defied all odds.

As they finally pulled away, their foreheads resting against each other, The Asset couldn't help but shed a tear. It was a tear of relief, of joy, of finally finding the one person who accepted him completely for who he was.

The Man whispered softly, his voice filled with a mixture of tenderness and resolve, "I won't let them take you away again. We'll face whatever comes together."

The Asset nodded, his determination mirrored in his eyes. "Together," he breathed, feeling an unshakable strength surge through his being.

And in that moment, The Asset and The Man knew that their bond would only grow stronger as they faced their shared future, hand in hand, side by side, their souls forever intertwined.
